data.comment: The match is underway at PreZero Arena.
Florian Badstubner awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Florian Badstubner signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Augsburg!
Augsburg's Daniel Caligiuri breaks free at PreZero Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 16, Augsburg push upfield but Florian Badstubner quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Goal! Florian Grillitsch heads Hoffenheim into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 17, Christoph Baumgartner with an assist there.
Free kick for Augsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 19, Florian Badstubner signals a Augsburg throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
In Sinsheim Hoffenheim attack through Florian Grillitsch. The finish is off target, however.
Florian Badstubner awards Augsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hoffenheim's Sebastian Rudy is on target but unsuccessful.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
In the minute 24, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Christoph Baumgartner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim are coming forward and Andrej Kramaric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 26, Augsburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
In the minute 28, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Sinsheim.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Augsburg.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Goal! Daniel Caligiuri (Augsburg) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Michael Gregoritsch to set up the goal.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, In Sinsheim, Hoffenheim push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim are whistled for offside.
Hoffenheim push forward at PreZero Arena and Andrej Kramaric gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Augsburg defence.
In the minute 40, Augsburg needs to be cautious. Hoffenheim have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Florian Badstubner signals a throw-in for Augsburg, close to Hoffenheim's area.
In the minute 42, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim are caught offside.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 44, Augsburg are on the attack at PreZero Arena, where Florian Niederlechner is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
Augsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Augsburg at PreZero Arena.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at PreZero Arena.
Goal! Florian Grillitsch gives Hoffenheim a 2-1 lead.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's now 3-1 in Sinsheim as Ihlas Bebou scores for Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Augsburg drives forward and Florian Niederlechner gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 59, Augsburg advance rapidly upfield but Florian Badstubner blows for offside.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Augsburg close to the penalty box.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
In the minute 61, Marco Richter is on a sub for Michael Gregoritsch for Augsburg.
In the minute 62, Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 64, Augsburg's Ruben Vargas misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
In Sinsheim Hoffenheim drive forward through Sebastian Rudy. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 64, Florian Badstubner signals a throw-in for Hoffenheim, close to Augsburg's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Sinsheim.
Augsburg are pushing forward but Florian Niederlechner's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 66, Florian Badstubner awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) is making a first substitution, with Robert Skov replacing Sebastian Rudy.
Free kick for Augsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Augsburg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 72, In Sinsheim Hoffenheim's Robert Skov is caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Robert Gumny is replacing Raphael Framberger for Augsburg at PreZero Arena.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
Robert Gumny is booked for the away team.
In the minute 75, At PreZero Arena, Hoffenheim are penalized for being offside.
Hoffenheim's Andrej Kramaric has run offside.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 77, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Augsburg.
In the minute 80, Augsburg's Florian Niederlechner gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hoffenheim defender.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
In Sinsheim, Augsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 83, Augsburg's Marco Richter misses with an attempt on goal.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 86, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Augsburg.
The home team replace Christoph Baumgartner with Mijat Gacinovic.
Marek Suchy for Augsburg is whistled offside.
In the minute 88, Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
Hoffenheim advance rapidly upfield but Florian Badstubner blows for offside.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Augsburg needs to be cautious. Hoffenheim have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
